name: TomatoCart
tag_list: ecommerce, software, shopping-cart, open-source, business, php, cms, web2-0, platform
overview:
TomatoCart, on behalf of the new generation of Ecommerce, is an innovatively and promisingly client-oriented open source shopping cart. Equipped with modern web 2.0 technology such as Ajax and Rich Internet Applications, TomatoCart realizes the combination of flexibility and functionality, offering significant usability with the desktop-like and multi-window supported admin panel and comprehensive features containing SEO, powerful promotion and management tools, and separate Email system. Backed by a specialized company and a group of professional developers, and assisted by the vigorous community, TomatoCart is determined to rise as a landmark in this robust industry.

â€¢It is the best way to experience the flexibility and stability in creating your online store. â€¢It is the premier approach to both rest assured and stay controlling over your business. â€¢It is the considerate provider for perfect settings and intuitive user interface. With TomatoCart as your preferred solution, you can never fail to find it incredible in functionality and efficiency, which ultimately renders your business into mighty enterprise.

TomatoCart is a client-oriented open source shopping cart. Balancing innovation and functionality, this high-performance shopping cart offers a great experience for flexibility and capability of further extensions along with innovative web desktop design enabling you to get easy control over management.
